```{r}
library(tidyverse)

# Get the list of CSV files
lynch_dfs <- list.files(path = "AmericanStories-main-DELL-GITHUB-REPO/lynch_dfs", 
                        pattern = "*.csv", full.names = TRUE)

# Read each CSV and add a filename column before rowbinding
lynch_dfs_combined <- map_dfr(lynch_dfs, ~ read_csv(.x) %>%
                               mutate(filename = basename(.x)))
```
